channel.title: [hyperion] problems with prayer glows [fixed]
channel.description:
EDIT: i had to activate them server sided to deactivate them properly. IDK but it worked. i feel like it should be client sided however
i have a habit of posting in the wrong section. w/e
its hard for me to explain exactly whats happening so i uploaded a video, but basically when deactivating prayers and using the sendConfig() method it deactivates multple prayer glows
the print out in the chatbox is the config ids im currently using for the prayer glows
[youtube]http://youtu.be/fZ5DUsUOybY[/youtube]

item.title: [hyperion] problems with prayer glows [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Housane Housane
item.description:
@Housane wrote:

Try downloading another source and ripping the prayer stuff from there

Read full topic
